p:
During the electrochemical Zn 2+ ion insertion, the layered-type δ-MnO 2 structure can transform to spinel-type ZnMn 2O 4 with Mn(III) state and layered-type δ-Zn xMnO 2 with Mn(II) state [ 15]. Meanwhile, the tunnel-type γ-MnO 2 suffered a structural transformation to spinel-type Mn(III) phase (ZnMn 2O 4), tunnel-type γ-Zn
x MnO 2 and layered-type L-Zn
y MnO 2 [ 40].
